abstract: Wading through technical specifications when shopping for a new digital camera during year-end sales can be overwhelming.
snippet: Wading through technical specifications when shopping for a new digital camera during year-end sales can be overwhelming.
lead_paragraph: TIP OF THE WEEK Wading through technical specifications and promotional literature when shopping year-end sales for a new digital camera can be overwhelming. If the megapixel numbers and other details start to blur together, a trip to Flickr’s Camera Finder page (flickr.com/cameras) offers a more visual approach to retail research  and if a picture is really worth a thousand words, you can find a few billon of them here. You can see the most popular models, explore different brands, read user reviews and see samples of photos taken with a specific camera. Other sample photos from a wide variety of cameras can also be found on the Digital Photography Review site (www.dpreview.com/gallery). J. D. BIERSDORFER

headline.main: Tip of the Week: Shopping for a New Digital Camera
